title: MSFS: HUGE News & BIG Concerns from the Developer Livestream #msfs2024 #flightsim
description:
This is the ultimate breakdown of the latest MSFS 2024 developer livestream. We're diving deep into the massive feature reveals, the roadmap for future updates, and most importantly, addressing the major concerns raised by the flight sim community. Is MSFS 2024 heading in the right direction? Let's discuss.

üìñ Chapters
00:00 - intro
00:28 - intro video
00:50 - Sim Update news
01:05 - MSFS 2024 Sim Update 3
01:51 - MSFS 2020 Sim Update 16
02:39 - MSFS 2024 aircrafts backported to MSFS 2020
03:12 - City Update 12 and Make Good Aircraft 4
03:34 - The Elephant in the Room: Community Concerns
03:55 - Concern 1: promises not converted to actions
04:06 - Concern 2: marketplace quality
04:30 - Concern 3: marketplace rental functionality
05:25 - Concern 4: landing of new content from 3rd party devs takes long 
06:16 - Concern 5: simmers want more airliners in the career mode
07:18 - Concern 6: fixes are continuously pushed out to the next sim update
07:49 - What will the focus be after Sim Update 3?
08:15 -  outro
09:50 - outro video
